title: Urgent appeal to find mum, 30, missing with her three young children
text:
Get the biggest daily news stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Police have launched a desperate appeal to find a mum who has gone missing with her three children.

Emma Davies, 30, has not been seen since she left her home in Priorslee, Telford, on Saturday with her children who are aged between one and 10.

West Mercia Police are appealing for information leading to the family's whereabouts.

Detective Inspector Joanne Woods said: “We’ve been carrying out a lot of enquiries to try and find Emma and her children and are now asking for the public’s help.

“If anyone has seen her or if anyone has any information about her whereabouts we would urge them to get in contact with us as soon as possible.”

Anyone with information should contact West Mercia Police on 101 quoting reference 725s 19/10/19.
description: Emma Davies and her children have not been seen since they left their home in Priorslee, Telford, on Saturday
